entry.title: SPV bitcoind? (was: Introducing BitcoinKit.framework)
entry.summary: There is a concern that if an SPV bitcoind transfer all control on validation rules to miner, a majority coalition of miners (pool operator) might even decide to change block reward rules if the rest of the network only verifies POW. Tam√°s Blummer, the Founder and CEO of bitsofproof.com, raised this concern in an email.
